articles.author: Alexander Brock
articles.title: Live updates: Residents in Boxing Day alert as huge fire breaks out - Birmingham Live
articles.description: The blaze started at the European Metal Recycling Plant in Trinity Road, Kingsbury
articles.content:
Residents were urged to keep doors and windows closed after a huge fire broke out at a scrap metal yard.
It broke out this morning, Sunday, December 26, at the European Metal Recycling Plant in Trin… [+639 chars]

articles.title: Europe's bizarre rules for Covid-19 vaccine passes - News24
articles.description: Efforts in Europe to encourage vaccine use through certificates proving vaccination, a negative test result or evidence of having had Covid have created a mountain of regulation.
articles.content:
• Going to a petrol station in Lithuania requires a Covid-19 pass.
  • The unvaccinated in Greece must produce a rapid test result to attend church.
